dmca.title: Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Admin [mailto:admin@myspacepimper.com] 
Posted At: Friday, May 05, 2006 1:48 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Cease and Desist
Subject: RE: Cease and Desist


Please see below and please be advised, this will be our final request
before we file cival action against the owner of the site and the sites
hosting company.
 
Thank you,
William Slover

________________________________

From: Admin [mailto:admin@myspacepimper.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 02, 2006 4:29 PM
To: 'support@registerfly.com'; 'admin@nurz.com'; 'abuse@registerfly.com'
Cc: 'support@NameCheap.com'; 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Subject: Cease and Desist


Slover Productions
325 Seeley Street
Belford, NJ 07718
 
RE: myspaceye.com (IP Address 74.52.3.50) using copyrighted code and
images from Myspacepimper.com
 
To whom it may concern,
This is an official request that you remove any and all
Myspacepimper.com copyrighted code, layouts and images from your site
(myspaceye.com) immediately.
 
Failure to do so in a timely manner will force our company to take civil
action against you, your company and your web site hosting company. We
will request monetary compensation as well as legal rights to your
domain name (myspaceye.com).
 
To save everyone involved the hassle of any future litigation, please
let us know as soon as you have conformed to the above request.
 
 
Thank you,
William Slover
